Package com.fdmgroup.PCTrack.controller

Class ComputerController

java.lang.Object
com.fdmgroup.PCTrack.controller.ComputerController
@RestController @CrossOrigin("http://localhost:5173") public class ComputerController extends Object
Controller for Computer entity Takes in Computer service and Report service to allow cascade delete if deleting a computer
